summary: HOLDING MY EMPLOYMENT OVER MY HEAD, ME AND MANY OTHER EMPLOYEES WERE FORCED TO OPERATE NUMEROUS VEHICLES ON HIGHWAYS AROUND NORTHERN VIRGINIA AND MARYLAND THAT FAILED TO MEET DOT SAFETY REGULATIONS. SPECIFIC VEHICLE I OPERATED COMMONLY - HORN DOESN'T WORK, FAN MOTOR WAS OUT(NO DEFROST), REAR LIGHTS NOT PROPERLY ILLUMINATED. OTHERS VEHICLES HAVE OTHER SAFETY ISSUES. ALL EMPLOYEES WERE TOLD BY MANAGEMENT TO NOT RECORD THESE ITEMS IN VEHICLE CONDITION REPORTS.
